sentence.Network_en: He weakly gets up. He sees Banzai , Shenzi , and Ed approaching and smiles.
sentence.Network_cn: 他无力地站起来,看着土狼班仔, 沈子和爱德华奸笑着冲过来.

sentence.Network_en: The Italian stands before port, the hand is pressed in wind, called sound: Banzai Lini!
sentence.Network_cn: 意大利人站在舱门前, 手按在胸口, 喊了声: 墨索里尼万岁!

banzai as a formal ritual was established in the promulgation of Meiji Constitution in 1889 when university students shouted banzai in front of the emperor's carriage .万岁作为一个正式的仪式成立于颁布明治宪法在1889年时，大学生高呼万岁前的辇。
